bug_report.Title: When changing the desktop grid from 4x6 to 5x6, the widget is not displayed
bug_report.Environment:
Redmi Note 7, MIUI Global 12.5.3, Realme 8 Pro, Android 11,
 RMX3081_11_A.47,
Realme C21 (UI 2.0) Android 11 RMX3201_11_C.09
bug_report.Steps_to_reproduce:
Open the 'Android grit test' app 
 Click on the button 'ADD WIDGET'
 Stretch Widget
 Go to phone settings - desktop - desktop grid - change desktop grid from 4x6 to 5x6
bug_report.Actual Result: Widget not showing when using desktop grid from 4x6 to 5x6
bug_report.Expected Result: When changing the desktop grid, the widget should take the form according to the specified parameters
